12  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter;
13  
14  import java.util.Collection;
15  import java.util.Objects;
16  import java.util.SortedSet;
17  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
18  import java.util.logging.Level;
19  import java.util.logging.Logger;
20  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
21  
22  import javax.swing.text.Document;
23  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
24  
25  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
26  import org.netbeans.api.annotations.common.CheckForNull;
27  import org.netbeans.api.annotations.common.NonNull;
28  import org.openide.util.Exceptions;
29  import org.openide.util.Lookup;
30  
31  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.FormattingFailedException;
32  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings;
33  
34  /**
35   * Singleton delegation class for calling the activated external formatter, if no external formatter is
36   * activated nothing will be done by this implementation. There is no fallback to the internal NetBeans
37   * formatter in here!
38   *
39   * @author markiewb
40   * @author bahlef
41   */
42  public class FormatterServiceDelegate {
43  	/** {@link Logger} of this class. */
44  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(FormatterServiceDelegate.class.getName());
45  
46  	/** {@link ReentrantLock} to synchronize the singleton instance creation. */
47  	private static final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
48  
49  	/** * Singleton instance of {@link FormatterServiceDelegate}. */
50  	private static FormatterServiceDelegate instance = null;
51  
52  	/**
53  	 * Private contructor due to singleton pattern.
54  	 */
55  	private FormatterServiceDelegate() {
56  	}
57  
58  	/**
59  	 * Returns the singleton instance of {@link FormatterServiceDelegate}.
60  	 *
61  	 * @return the singleton instance
62  	 */
63  	@NonNull
64  	public static FormatterServiceDelegate getInstance() {
65  		lock.lock();
66  
67  		try {
68  			if (instance == null) {
69  				instance = new FormatterServiceDelegate();
70  			}
71  
72  			return instance;
73  		} finally {
74  			lock.unlock();
75  		}
76  	}
77  
78  	/**
79  	 * Formats the given {@link StyledDocument} in regard to the given {@code changedElements}.
80  	 *
81  	 * @param document the {@link StyledDocument} which should be formatted
82  	 * @param changedElements a {@link SortedSet} containing ranges as {@link Pair} objects that should be formatted
83  	 *
84  	 * @return {@code true} if and only if a external formatter was found to handle the given
85  	 *         {@link StyledDocument} even if there was an error while formatting, otherwise
86  	 *         and if an external formatter delegates formatting to the NetBeans formatter it
87  	 *         is {@code false}
88  	 */
89  	public boolean format(StyledDocument document, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements) {
90  		try {
91  			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
92  			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
93  				try {
94  					return formatterService.format(document, changedElements);
95  				} catch (FormattingFailedException ex) {
96  					log.log(Level.INFO, formatterService.getDisplayName() + " failed to format the code", ex);
97  				} catch (Exception ex) {
98  					log.log(Level.WARNING, formatterService.getDisplayName() + " failed to format the code", ex);
99  				}
100 
101 				return true;
102 			}
103 		} catch (Exception e) {
104 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
105 		}
106 
107 		return false;
108 	}
109 
110 	/**
111 	 * Returns the continuation indent size configured by the formatter which is
112 	 * activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
113 	 * NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
114 	 *
115 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the continuation indent size
116 	 *        is requested
117 	 *
118 	 * @return the continuation indent size configured by the formatter which is
119 	 *         activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the
120 	 *         internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
121 	 */
122 	@CheckForNull
123 	public Integer getContinuationIndentSize(Document document) {
124 		try {
125 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
126 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
127 				return formatterService.getContinuationIndentSize(document);
128 			}
129 		} catch (Exception e) {
130 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
131 		}
132 
133 		return null;
134 	}
135 
136 	/**
137 	 * Returns the indent size configured by the formatter which is activated for
138 	 * the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code
139 	 * formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
140 	 *
141 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the indent size is requested
142 	 *
143 	 * @return the indent size configured by the formatter which is activated for
144 	 *         the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans
145 	 *         code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
146 	 */
147 	@CheckForNull
148 	public Integer getIndentSize(Document document) {
149 		try {
150 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
151 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
152 				return formatterService.getIndentSize(document);
153 			}
154 		} catch (Exception e) {
155 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
156 		}
157 
158 		return null;
159 	}
160 
161 	/**
162 	 * Returns the right margin (position of the red line in the editor) configured
163 	 * by the formatter which is activated for the given {@link Document}, or
164 	 * {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given
165 	 * {@code document}.
166 	 *
167 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the right margin is requested
168 	 *
169 	 * @return the right margin (position of the red line in the editor) configured
170 	 *         by the formatter which is activated for the given {@link Document},
171 	 *         or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code formatter is used for
172 	 *         the given {@code document}
173 	 */
174 	@CheckForNull
175 	public Integer getRightMargin(Document document) {
176 		try {
177 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
178 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
179 				return formatterService.getRightMargin(document);
180 			}
181 		} catch (Exception e) {
182 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
183 		}
184 
185 		return null;
186 	}
187 
188 	/**
189 	 * Returns the spaces per tab configured by the formatter which is activated
190 	 * for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans
191 	 * code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
192 	 *
193 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the spaces per tab is requested
194 	 *
195 	 * @return the spaces per tab configured by the formatter which is activated
196 	 *         for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
197 	 *         NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
198 	 */
199 	@CheckForNull
200 	public Integer getSpacesPerTab(Document document) {
201 		try {
202 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
203 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
204 				return formatterService.getSpacesPerTab(document);
205 			}
206 		} catch (Exception e) {
207 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
208 		}
209 
210 		return null;
211 	}
212 
213 	/**
214 	 * Returns the currently configured {@link FormatterService} implementation for
215 	 * the given {@code document}. If the internal NetBeans formatter is configured
216 	 * or the implementation of the configured {@link FormatterService} could not be
217 	 * found {@code null} will be returned.
218 	 *
219 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the {@link FormatterService} is requested
220 	 *
221 	 * @return the currently configured {@link FormatterService} implementation
222 	 *         for the given {@code document}. If the internal NetBeans formatter is configured
223 	 *         or the implementation of the configured {@link FormatterService} could
224 	 *         not be found {@code null} will be returned
225 	 *
226 	 * @throws Exception if an error occurs
227 	 */
228 	@CheckForNull
229 	private FormatterService getActiveFormatterService(Document document) throws Exception {
230 		MimeType mimeType = MimeType.getMimeType(document);
231 		if (mimeType != null) {
232 			Preferences prefs = Settings.getActivePreferences(document);
233 			String activeFormatterId = prefs.get(Settings.ENABLED_FORMATTER_PREFIX + mimeType.toString(), Settings.DEFAULT_FORMATTER);
234 
235 			Collection<? extends FormatterService> formatterServices = Lookup.getDefault().lookupAll(FormatterService.class);
236 			for (FormatterService formatterService : formatterServices) {
237 				if (Objects.equals(activeFormatterId, formatterService.getId())) {
238 					return formatterService;
239 				}
240 			}
241 		}
242 
243 		return null;
244 	}
245 
246 	/**
247 	 * Returns the expand tab to spaces flag configured by the formatter which is
248 	 * activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
249 	 * NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
250 	 *
251 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the expand tab to spaces flag is requested
252 	 *
253 	 * @return the expand tab to spaces flag configured by the formatter which is
254 	 *         activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the
255 	 *         internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given
256 	 *         {@code document}
257 	 */
258 	@CheckForNull
259 	public Boolean isExpandTabToSpaces(Document document) {
260 		try {
261 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
262 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
263 				return formatterService.isExpandTabToSpaces(document);
264 			}
265 		} catch (Exception e) {
266 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
267 		}
268 
269 		return null;
270 	}
271 
272 	@CheckForNull
273 	public Boolean organizeImports(StyledDocument document, boolean afterFixImports) {
274 		try {
275 			FormatterService formatterService = getActiveFormatterService(document);
276 			if (formatterService != null && formatterService.canHandle(document)) {
277 				return formatterService.organizeImports(document, afterFixImports);
278 			}
279 		} catch (Exception e) {
280 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
281 		}
282 
283 		return null;
284 	}
285 }
